templates.title: Poste.io
templates.name: poste-io
templates.description: Full stack mail server solution with SSL TLS support. POP3s, SMTP(s), IMAPs, RSPAMD, Clamav, Roundcube(HTTPS), SPF, DKIM with easy installation and web administration.
templates.note: Free version of full mail server solution. POP3, SMTP, IMAP, Spamassassin, WebMail, WebAdmin
